settings.title: What is Fox Charms program?
settings.content: Fox Charms is a loyalty program offered by Foxtale. To access the benefits of the program, you must log in to the program through www.Foxtale.in.

settings.title: What are Fox Charms?
settings.content: Fox Charms is a currency that allows you to access exclusive offers and discounts when you shop on Foxtale. You can earn and redeem Fox Charms not only on Foxtale but also on other partner brands that are part of the Fox Charms program.

settings.title: Is there a membership fee for Fox Charms?
settings.content: No, there is no membership fee to participate in the Fox Charms program. All you need to do is click on the rewards program and join the program.

settings.title: How many Fox Charms do I get for shopping on Foxtale?
settings.content: You will receive 5 Fox Charms for every Rs. 100 spent on Foxtale. For instance, if you purchase a product for Rs. 1000, you will earn 50 Fox Charms. Once your order is delivered, the Fox Charms will be credited to your account after the return period (if any) has ended. Once the Fox Charms are credited, you can redeem them immediately. However, please note that you will not earn any Fox Charms for reward purchases.

settings.title: What is the validity period for Fox Charms?
settings.content: Fox Charms are valid for 1 year from the date they are credited to your account.

settings.title: What are the ways to use Fox Charms?
settings.content:
Here are some ways you can use the Fox Charms you earn on Foxtale:

  • Redeem them for exclusive offers and discounts on Foxtale products.
  • Use coins to get discounts on partner brands participating in the Fox Charms program.

settings.title: Is it possible to use Fox Charms as the sole payment method for shopping on Foxtale?
settings.content: No, it is not possible to use Fox Charms for the entire purchase amount. Fox Charms can only be used to get a discount on a certain value of the cart, and the discount percentage is available on our website.

settings.title: Is it possible to cancel rewards redeemed with Fox Charms?
settings.content: No, once you have redeemed rewards using Fox Charms, it is not possible to reverse the transaction.

settings.title: When will Fox Charms be credited to my account after purchase?
settings.content: Once your order is delivered, the Fox Charms will be credited to your account after the return period (if any) has ended.

settings.title: What happens to the Fox Charms used for a purchase if I cancel or return the order?
settings.content:
If you cancel the order, the Fox Charms used for the purchase will be credited back to your account immediately.

If you return the product, the Fox Charms used for the purchase will be credited to your account once the product has passed the quality check and the return has been approved.

settings.title: If I cancel the order, will the Fox Charms that were to be credited to my account also be cancelled?
settings.content: Yes, the Fox Charms that you were supposed to earn will be revoked for the cancelled order.

settings.title: Where can I check the details of my Fox Charms?
settings.content:
To view the details of your Fox Charms, please follow these easy steps on the Foxtale website:

  • Log in to Fox Charms Progam.
  • Navigate to the bottom of the page and click on the "Check History" button. This will take you to the coins history page, where you can check the status of your Fox Charms, including whether they are 'on the way,' 'credited,' 'redeemed,' or 'expired.'
